duties_responsibilities.duty: Mapping of Organizational Structure of Company and Customizing Carrier Master data aligned to Purchase Organization, Plant codes & Company codes.
Project leadership and support of all active units and departments using SAP, with primary focus area on Transportation Management.
Configuring and customizing transportation management processes such as OTR/DTR creation to FUBR, VSR Optimizer Planning, Transport Execution, Event Management & Settlement (FCC) process.
Handling queries in SAP TM and identifying and resolving issues by analyzing functionality and determining solutions.
Reviewing, analyzing, and evaluating as-is business processes for transportation management and designing to-be business processes for transportation management based on SAP integration to TMS.
Configuring and maintaining the relevant ECC/S4 HANA components, including SAP TM, and supporting business users in delivery of end-user training.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
